unscramble(), startIndex = 0, endIndex = 0
Den globale variable, der returneres, bør fanges af FlashController, og tjekkes for scramble, evt. unscrambles, og derefter sende det "en tak længere op" så det kan gives til intended user.

template.name: SRAM

nta.system: system SystemReset, ROMStage, Flash, RomExtManifestsToTry, CheckPubKeyValid, VerifyRomExtSignature, ValidityCheckObserver, OTBN, RomExt, PmpModule, Zeno, FinalJumpToRomExt, ReadBootPolicy, CheckRomExtManifest, ExceptionHandler, ReadPublicKey, LifeCycleController, FlashController, SRAMController, SRAM, MemoryHandling, ManifestObserver, OTP, OTPController, EDN, EntropySource, CSRNG, HASH;

query.formula: A[] ROMStage.ReadyToRunROMExt imply (PmpRegions[0].execute && PmpRegions[0].startAddress <= ROMStage.currentManifest.entryPoint && PmpRegions[0].endAddress >= ROMStage.currentManifest.entryPoint + 4)
query.comment: Whenever the rom ext is running, it must be true, that the PMP regions allow for executing that entrypoint. G1, G12.
There is at least one trace, such that it doesn't fail. In other words: It is possible to succeed. Debug
The ROM Stage will never fail. This is due to the hardcoded values in the manifest / memory. If we eventually implement non-determinism, we expect that this property might not hold. Debug
If the manifest is not the valid manifest, then the ROMSTage will go back to the beginning. G1
If the currentManifest is the valid manifest, then eventually the FinalJump will be in the success state, and the manifest will be the same. G1

Checks whether success is possible
Debug
We will always reach a state where the rom ext is running. Debug

query.formula: A[] PmpModule.Good_Write imply (exists (pmpIndex : int[0,15]) PmpRegions[pmpIndex].startAddress <= PmpModule.start && PmpRegions[pmpIndex].endAddress >= PmpModule.end && PmpRegions[pmpIndex].write)
query.comment: Whenever the PmpModule is in the GW location, there must exist a pmp region, that allows a write in that region. G10

query.formula: A[] PmpModule.Good_Execute imply (exists (pmpIndex : int[0,15]) PmpRegions[pmpIndex].startAddress <= PmpModule.start && PmpRegions[pmpIndex].endAddress >= PmpModule.end && PmpRegions[pmpIndex].execute)
query.comment: Whenever the PmpModule is in the GW location, there must exist a pmp region, that allows a execute in that region. G12

query.formula: A[] PmpModule.Good_Read imply (exists (pmpIndex : int[0,15]) PmpRegions[pmpIndex].startAddress <= PmpModule.start && PmpRegions[pmpIndex].endAddress >= PmpModule.end && PmpRegions[pmpIndex].read)
query.comment: Whenever the PmpModule is in the GW location, there must exist a pmp region, that allows a read in that region. G11
A bad write request is never issued G10
A bad execute request is never issued G12
A bad read request is never issued G11
An error state / exception state is never reached. Debug
More a debug check than a security check. Could we ever have that we are reading a scrambled value? No the query states that the most recently read value will always get unscrambled. debug
Bekræfter at man ved ROMStage.CheckedSignature altid har et i alle felterne i manifestet G1
Bekræfter at man ved ROMStage.CheckingSignature altid har 1 i de felter der er blevet checket G1
Bekræfter at man altid har 1 i identifer efter man har lavet checket. G1
The most recently read memory from Flash is always unscrambled before the receiver receives it. debug
The manifestObserver never reaches its fail location. G3
Verifies EqualManifestContents for the negaive case. debug
Verifies CheckRomExtManifest template and checkRomExtManifest function. G1

query.formula: A[] FinalJumpToRomExt.ROM_ext_running imply forall (i : int[0,6]) SRAM.indexIsEmpty(i)
query.comment: Checks whether the memory is wiped after initiating the ROM ext. We expect this to fail, since it's not part of the boot code / OpenTitan G9
There is never a private key in SRAM G8

query.formula: A[] ROMStage.RomExtRunning imply forall (i : int[0, 6]) (SRAM.scrambled[i] || SRAM.indexIsEmpty(i))
query.comment: At the end of the ROMStage, the entire SRAM should be either scrambled or empty. In our case it's scrambled. G9
If the success state is reached, the manifest observer will be in its success state also. G3
